comment: i loved him!!! he always explained things well and kept everything interesting. he did an example for what he was teaching in almost every class. a lot of them involving explosions or fire! he made having and 8 o'clock class exciting!

Criswell is hands down one of the best professors I have ever had.  His lectures are incredibly clear and informative and his sense of humor keeps things interesting.  Definitely take a class with him if you get the chance, you won't regret it.

Dr. Criswell is awesome. He is really understanding of the demands of a graduate student so his class was like a breath of  fresh air.  He is pretty lenient on due dates which made for a more enjoyable and less stressful experience! I would recommend his class to anyone!

Definately my favorite professor. I had this class at 8 am and I actually wanted to wake up every morning and come to class. Never missed a class! He shows examples of everything he does to make things clearer. Very interesting class.
If you don't understand something, ask him after class. He's willing to explain it to you , very helpful, make chemistry more interesting and fun...

Very Exciting teacher, somehow finds a way to make chem interesting, crazy right? Very helpful has study sessions before tests, hw isnt graded to harshly. tests are fairly challenging but if you read and look over your notes ull prob be fine, one of the better professors ive had loves what he does
He is a very nice guy and is willing to help as much as possible.  He provided feedback on everything we sent to him.  There are a lot of articles to read for this class, but there is no textbook.
